variants.headline: adset:Adset-1 ATC — Improve ROAS Performance
variants.copy: ROAS decreased -25.865% with severity high. Cause: Value perception & landing misalignment. Recommended actions: Clarify offer & pricing above fold; Add persuasive social proof; Strengthen CTA to reinforce urgency. Expected Improvement: +10% → +35%. CTA: Buy Now
